properties.displayName: Suspicious Child Process Created as System
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessIntegrityLevel =~ "System" and (InitiatingProcessAccountName contains "AUTHORI" or InitiatingProcessAccountName contains "AUTORI") and ((InitiatingProcessAccountName =~ "NETWORK SERVICE" and InitiatingProcessAccountDomain startswith "") or (InitiatingProcessAccountName =~ "LOCAL SERVICE" and InitiatingProcessAccountDomain startswith "")) and (AccountName contains "AUTHORI" or AccountName contains "AUTORI") and ((AccountName =~ "SYSTEM" and AccountDomain startswith "") or (AccountName =~ "Système" and AccountDomain startswith "") or (AccountName =~ "СИСТЕМА" and AccountDomain startswith ""))) and (not((ProcessCommandLine contains "DavSetCookie" and FolderPath endswith "\\rundll32.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detection of child processes spawned with SYSTEM privileges by parents with LOCAL SERVICE or NETWORK SERVICE accounts
